title: Finally made it too silver YAY!!!!!!
body: After 839 wins in bronze I finally made it too silver thought I would never get out of bronze but I kept trying and finally got there in the end so to all you bronze players just keep trying and you will get better and get out eventually. :D

replies.body: Happy for you. my latest problem seems to be disconnection problems in my deciding game in promos
That is an amazing commitment. I'm honestly impressed. But you aren't done yet, ON TO GOLD!
I made it to SV 4 days ago from B3
just curious, 839 wins... how many losses?

Bronze I.

Starting playing...

Got Silver III within 3 days.
